pages.text: Squeak. A mighty hammer with the awesome power to summon an army (of hamsters) to your side. The Fzzyhammer adds the unique spell $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book/hamptertime)Hamptertime$(). Can be used like a weapon, and can mine 2x2 blocks at a time in a tunneling pattern. $(br2)$(l)Mana:$() 1250
$(italic)It squeaks softly whenever it strikes a foe.$()
